## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withLink() method

Define a component link.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withLink(name: string, link: LinkObject | ReferenceObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | The name of the link |
|  link | <code>LinkObject &#124; ReferenceObject</code> | Specification of the link |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
